drink.name: Espresso
drink.preparation: Pressurized hot water is forced through finely ground coffee beans, resulting in a concentrated and strong coffee.

drink.name: Cappuccino
drink.preparation: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foamed milk, layered in a cup.

drink.name: Latte
drink.preparation: Espresso and steamed milk, topped with a thin layer of frothed milk.

bean.name: Arabica
bean.description: A high-quality, mild coffee with a delicate flavor and aroma.

bean.name: Robusta
bean.description: A more bitter and strong coffee with a higher caffeine content than Arabica beans.

accessory.name: French press
accessory.description: A simple and popular brewing method that produces a full-bodied coffee with a rich flavor.

accessory.name: Aeropress
accessory.description: A newer brewing method that uses air pressure to extract flavor from the coffee, resulting in a smooth and clean taste.
